page.title: 12TRANSPORT TO SCHOOL
page.content: The aim of this project is to find out how people get to school and how long it takes them to travel the distance.I also aim to discover the area the school gives a service to.I did a survey of 84 children between the ages of 12 & 13 which is our second year. The results were as follows:- DISTANCE(KM) TRANSPORT TIME(MIN) <1=14 WALK=52 >10=35 1-2=29 BIKE= 7 11-20=21 2-3=40 CAR =16 21-30=19 >3= 1 BUS = 9 >30= 9 TRANSPORT: Although 48% of the pupils live >2km away it is suprising that the majority of them still make their own way to school.Many of them walk or bike along the course of the old railway line which ends at the school gate.
